articles.title: Ambuja Cements stock sees target cuts by foreign brokers. Still a buy? - Economic Times
articles.description: Goldman Sachs has maintained its 'buy' rating on Ambuja Cements but with a reduced 12-month target of Rs 385 from Rs 405.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: A host of foreign brokerages have cut Ambuja Cements' price target following its fourth quarter results. The revised targets suggest 6-25 per cent potential upside in the stock.
